trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around March 10th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting down upstairs when a big bright light fly by my window and light up the whole area. I got so freaked out I woke up my mom just to make sure I wasn't just imagining it. We went downstairs and it was no where to be found. a few minutes later it comes back into view. This time it doesn't come near the window it lands very quietly in my backyard. In a matter of seconds i hear My back door begin to open. then footsteps. i walk to the stairs to see who or what was there. I went up to the stairs and saw a giant black figure standing there. It looked at me then everything went black. I woke up in the middle of the floor, and my mother was no where to be found. She is still missing to this day. It is very hard to type these words so i am going to stop becuse i knw they hurt you to.
Summary: I saw the UFO it came in knocked me out and i don`t remember much except waking up in the middle of the floor and having a sharp pain in my back
